arts.ttl: Fabrizio Romano reveals West Ham board stance on sacking Julen Lopetegui today
arts.sum: West Ham United’s board have instructed Julen Lopetegui to deliver immediate change as speculation around a potential sacking swirls, according to Fabrizio Romano. As reported... The post Fabrizio Romano reveals West Ham board stance on sacking Julen Lopetegui today appeared first on West Ham Zone.

arts.ttl: Liverpool 5-1 West Ham: Player ratings as Jota and Gakpo see off 10-man Hammers
arts.sum: LM: Cody Gakpo - 9/10 - Rarely gave the ball away and was a helpful outlet for Liverpool as they looked to stretch West Ham's defence. A Jarell Quansah own goal had seen the visitors lead early doors, but the game was turned on its head by Diogo Jota goals either side of half-time.

arts.ttl: Julen Lopetegui leaves Anfield on crutches after injuring his calf in frustration during West Ham's dismal 5-1 defeat against Liverpool in the Carabao Cup
arts.sum: West Ham manager Julen Lopetegui was left needing crutches after injuring his calf while letting off steam in the Anfield dugout during West Ham's 5-1 Carabao Cup thrashing against Liverpool.

arts.ttl: Carabao Cup fourth-round draw in full as Man Utd, Liverpool and Arsenal discover fate
arts.sum: The draw for the fourth round of the Carabao Cup has been completed, with Manchester United, Manchester City and Chelsea among the clubs to learn their fate for the October fixtures

arts.ttl: Liverpool 5-1 West Ham PLAYER RATINGS: Which Premier League winner did not look comfortable for Reds? Who's a brilliant little pest? And which Hammers man was 'brain-dead'?
arts.sum: Carabao Cup holders Liverpool came from a goal down to demolish West Ham at Anfield and book their place in the fourth round. JAMES SHARPE was at Anfield for Mail Sport.

arts.ttl: Diogo Jota double helps Liverpool to comfortable win over 10-man West Ham
arts.sum: Jota lost his place to Darwin Nunez for the 3-0 Premier League win over Bournemouth on Saturday, but the two were paired together at Anfield.

arts.ttl: Ings, Cresswell and Soler make first starts of season at Anfield
arts.sum: Danny Ings, Aaron Cresswell and Carlos Soler make their first competitive starts of the season, while Łukasz Fabiański, Jean-Clair Todibo, Vladimír Coufal and Tomáš Souček also come into the side. A strong bench is named too by Lopetegui, with Aaron Wan-Bissaka, Konstantinos Mavropanos, Emerson, Guido Rodríguez, Mohammed Kudus, Lucas Paquetá and Michail Antonio to call upon, while Andy Irving, who caught the eye during his Premier League debut on Saturday, completes the matchday squad.

arts.ttl: Steidten Wanted 2x Champion Instead of Lopetegui at West Ham
arts.sum: Tim Steidten preferred to appoint a two-time league champion over Julen Lopetegui at West Ham during the summer to replace David Moyes.

arts.ttl: West Ham summer signing expected to be handed start v Liverpool - report
arts.sum: Jean Clair-Todibo is “expected” to start West Ham United’s clash with Liverpool at Anfield, according to the Daily Mail. The outlet reported on its website... The post West Ham summer signing expected to be handed start v Liverpool - report appeared first on West Ham Zone.

arts.ttl: Liverpool vs West Ham: Preview, predictions and lineups
arts.sum: Liverpool begin the defence of their Carabao Cup crown on Wednesday evening as they host West Ham United at Anfield. The Reds beat West Ham 5-1 en route to the trophy last season and will view the Carabao Cup as a promising opportunity for Arne Slot to earn his first piece of silverware as the club's manager.
